General_Description: '''Bounty on Athenian Ships''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s genetic memories, relived by [[Layla Hassan]] through the Portable [[Animus|Animus HR-8.5]].
Section_Description:
Kassandra noticed a bounty for [[Athens|Athenian]] [[ship]]s on a [[message board]]:
#"Athenian ships blot the horizon, but we are not defeated! Sink as many of their ships as you can and earn your glory!"
#"Bounty offered for the sinking of Athenian ships. Send them to the bottom of the ocean for [[Sparta]]."
Section_Outcome: Kassandra accepted the contract, and sought out the Athenian ships, sinking them and claiming the bounty.
Section_Behind_the_scenes: The bounty flavor texts are not bound to any single region or city.
Section_References:
*''[[Assassin's Creed: Odyssey]]''
